backend/main.mo: Motoko canister with authorization mixin, seeded restaurants and menu data, and type definitions and state maps for restaurants, menu items, orders, users, and carts.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing implemented features, affected files, components, and test IDs for the Sakthi Snacks image‑correction work.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose of major frontend React files including pages, hooks, components, and cart logic.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup defining light/dark theme variables and base style rules for the app.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point that loads the root element and bootstraps the React app via main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React router setup with routes, layout, authentication checks, and profile‑setup gating for the application.
frontend/src/cart/CartContext.tsx: React context managing cart items with localStorage persistence and operations for add, remove, update, and clear.
frontend/src/cart/cartTypes.ts: Type definitions for cart items including IDs, pricing, quantities, and restaurant metadata.
Login/logout button handling Internet Identity authentication and clearing React Query cache on logout.
frontend/src/components/auth/RequireAuth: Wrapper component blocking access to protected pages and showing a login prompt when unauthenticated.
frontend/src/components/common/AppErrorB: React error boundary that catches rendering errors and displays a styled fallback UI with reset and refresh options.
frontend/src/components/common/ImageWith: Image component that swaps to a fallback source on load failure and resets when the src changes.
frontend/src/components/common/QueryStat: Provides loading skeletons, error alerts, and empty-state UI components for query results.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppLayout: Main application layout with header navigation, cart indicator, footer, and content container.
frontend/src/components/profile/ProfileS: Dialog prompting the user to submit their name and save their profile via a mutation.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Hook that creates and caches a backend actor based on identity, invalidating dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useCurrentUserProfile: Hooks to fetch and save the current user's profile using the actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides context and hooks for managing Internet Identity login, stored identities, and auth client setup.
frontend/src/hooks/useOrderDetail.ts: Hooks to fetch order status and order items for a given order ID.
frontend/src/hooks/useOrders.ts: Hook to list the caller's orders; currently returns an empty array as a placeholder.
frontend/src/hooks/usePlaceOrder.ts: Mutation hook that submits a new order and invalidates the orders query on success.
frontend/src/hooks/useRestaurant.ts: Hooks to fetch a restaurant and its menu based on a restaurant ID.
frontend/src/hooks/useRestaurants.ts: Hook that fetches the list of restaurants from the backend actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind setup defining theme variables, dark mode styles, and global background styling.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Entrypoint that mounts the app with React Query and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/src/pages/CartPage.tsx: Renders the shopping cart, manages item quantity, handles checkout, and triggers order placement with authentication checks.
frontend/src/pages/OrderDetailPage.tsx: Fetches and displays order status and items, with loading, error handling, and manual refresh support.
frontend/src/pages/OrdersListPage.tsx: Lists the user's past orders with basic info and navigation to detailed order pages.
Shows a restaurant’s details and menu, validates IDs, and allows adding items to the cart with quantity controls.
frontend/src/pages/RestaurantsListPage.t: Displays a grid of restaurants with images and descriptions, handling loading, errors, and navigation to details.
frontend/src/utils/formatCurrency.ts: Converts minor-unit numeric prices into formatted INR currency strings.
frontend/src/utils/getErrorMessage.ts: Extracts a safe, user-friendly message from unknown error values.
frontend/src/utils/imageFallbacks.ts: Defines fallback image paths and a large name-to-image mapping for restaurant and dish images.
frontend/src/utils/restaurantId.ts: Parses and validates restaurant ID strings into positive bigint values.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers for reading URL parameters, persisting them in sessionStorage, and managing hash-based params.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind CSS theme, colors, animations, and plugins.
project_state.json: Tracks project state, issues, and feature requests related to correcting mismatched Sakthi Snacks images.
